title: Fix Access Pending issue and add VCRM logo

requirements.summary: Display the VCRM logo in the sidebar header and on the login page
acceptanceCriteria: The VCRM logo is visible at the top of the sidebar navigation on all authenticated pages.
The VCRM logo is visible on the login page.
The logo renders correctly in both light and dark modes.
The logo image is served from frontend/public/assets/generated/vcrm-logo.png.

file_operations.description: Save the generated VCRM logo image (blue 3D V-shape with bar chart icon, orange sphere accent, orbital swoosh ring, and silver-gray 'CRM' text on white background) at this workspace path. This image will be referenced by the frontend components.

Add the VCRM logo to the sidebar header at the top of the navigation area. Import and render an element with src pointing to '/assets/generated/vcrm-logo.dim_512x512.png'. Apply appropriate sizing (e.g., h-12 or h-16), alt text 'VCRM Logo', and dark mode compatibility. Position the logo above the existing navigation links in the sidebar.

Add the VCRM logo to the login page layout. Import and render an element with src pointing to '/assets/generated/vcrm-logo.dim_512x512.png' in a prominent position on the page (e.g., centered above the sign-in button or in the feature highlights panel). Apply appropriate sizing, alt text 'VCRM Logo', and ensure it is visible in both light and dark modes.
